quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, take a trip south. Then, go to the west. With that over with, make an effort to move west. Okay, and then, try to go west. And then, go west. Then, go north. With that accomplished, go east. With that accomplished, try to venture east. With that over with, go east. After that, recover the book from the floor of the studio. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a studio.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a bookshelf. The bookshelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_0]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a mantle. The mantle is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the mantle you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] However, the mantle, like an empty mantle, has nothing on it. You think about smashing the mantle to bits, throwing the bits into the garbage, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in a shower. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser nearby.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The dresser is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've entered a workshop. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Henderson's safe, which looks standard, nearby.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The Henderson's safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Henderson's safe is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a study, but I guess I was wrong. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the mantelpiece.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You move on, clearly furious with your TextWorld experience.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've entered a vault.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. A normal kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchenette. An usual kind of place.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator right there by you.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_3]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. An ordinary one. Let's see what's in here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You are in a lounge. It seems to be pretty usual here. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can see a Microsoft style locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The Microsoft style locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The Microsoft style locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
Ah, the parlor. This is some kind of parlor, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere.

 You make out a portmanteau.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a bench. The bench is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_3]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You're now in a closet.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a scullery.

 You can see a pan. [if there is something on the s_4]On the pan you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You move on, clearly done caring about your TextWorld experience.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. A typical one.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a launderette. An ordinary kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] drawer close by.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna.

 You see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 6 locker, which looks usual, close by.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The type 6 locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The type 6 locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a rack. [if there is something on the s_5]On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_5]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]However, the rack, like an empty rack, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. An ordinary kind of place.

 You see a couch. The couch is typical.[if there is something on the s_6] On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_6]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing is empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You are in a cellar. A normal one.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a stand. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a table. The table is typical.[if there is something on the s_8] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_8]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookhouse. A normal one.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a Henderson's style chest.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The Henderson's style chest contains [a list of things in the c_8]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The Henderson's style chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. A typical one.

 You can see a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_10] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] The counter appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You can make out a board. [if there is something on the s_9]On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_9]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. This always happens![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You've just walked into an office. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 [if c_9 is locked]A locked[else if c_9 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] typical looking box is in the room.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The box contains [a list of things in the c_9]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

objective: You are now playing a fast paced game of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, make an effort to travel south. With that accomplished, try to go west. And then, make an attempt to venture west. And then, make an attempt to move west. And then, make an attempt to take a trip west. That done, make an attempt to head north. With that over with, move east. Then, attempt to move east. If you can get through with that, go east. With that over with, recover the book from the floor of the studio. And if you do that, you're the winner!
